Biography

Ishank Juneja

I am a third year undergraduate student at the Electrical Engg. Dept. IIT Bombay. Aside from major I am also doing a minor in Computer Science. Through the integrated Masters program here at IITB, I will be specialising in Communication and Signal processing, an area which I am passionate about.

Since I am interested in Signal Processing, I have done some projects in Digital Image processing. These projects have been through an Internship, a self initiated project and course work.

Most Recently as a summer project, I studied some optimization problems using Integer Programming. Details Here

Many courses at IITB have a hands on project component. Some of the most Interesting ones are Summarised Here

Outside of projects and course work I enjoy playing Squash. The fast paced indoor raquet game is well suited to the often rainy weather here in Mumbai. I used to write on Quora Where my posts have become slightly popular.
